    • 方法详细资料

      • heartbeat

        public void heartbeat(java.lang.String serviceName,
             java.lang.String registryHost,
             int registryPort,
             int chunkNumber,
             boolean logable)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Heart beat service. Provide slave information report function.
        指定者:
        heartbeat 在接口中 SDMasterService
        参数:
        serviceName - slave service name.
        registryHost - slave registry host.
        registryPort - slave registry port.
        chunkNumber - slave chunk number.
        logable - if to log.
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - throws when Remote error happen.

      • updateDataNode

        public void updateDataNode(java.lang.String serviceName,
                  java.lang.String registryHost,
                  int registryPort,
                  int chunkNumber,
                  long timestamp,
                  boolean logable)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Update data nodes in index
        指定者:
        updateDataNode 在接口中 SDMasterService
        参数:
        serviceName - slave service name.
        registryHost - slave registry host.
        registryPort - slave registry port.
        chunkNumber - slave chunk number.
        timestamp - time when this operation happens.
        logable - If to log.
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - throws when Remote error happen.

        public SDDFSFile createFile(java.lang.String fileName,

                   boolean logable)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Create file in ArcherDFS.
        指定者:
        createFile 在接口中 SDMasterService
        参数:
        fileName - Filename of this file.
        re - Number of replication of a file.
        logable - If to log.
        返回:
        return reference of a SDDFSFile.
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - throws when Remote error happen.
